doc:
Rufus (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rufus_(actor) 0 Rufus (born 19 December 1942) or Zio Vittorio is the stage name of Italian-French actor Jacques Narcy. He is best known to international film audiences for his performance as Raphaël, the father of Amélie Poulain in Amélie (2001). Rufus ( born 19_December_1942 ) or Zio_Vittorio is the_stage_name of Italian-French_actor_Jacques_Narcy . He is_best_known to international_film_audiences for his_performance as Raphaël , the_father of Amélie_Poulain in Amélie_(_2001_) .
